titleStmt.title: An exhortacion to the carienge of Chrystes crosse wyth a true and brefe confutacion of false and papisticall doctryne.
titleStmt.author: Bradford, John, 1510?-1555.

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 5890 on UMI microfilm.
Some print show-through; some pages stained and torn.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
